org.ldaptive.provider.unboundid

Class UnboundIDStartTLSConnectionFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ldaptive.provider.AbstractProviderConnectionFactory<UnboundIDProviderConfig>
      • org.ldaptive.provider.unboundid.UnboundIDStartTLSConnectionFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ProviderConnectionFactory<UnboundIDProviderConfig>

    public class UnboundIDStartTLSConnectionFactory
extends AbstractProviderConnectionFactory<UnboundIDProviderConfig>
    Creates ldap connections using the UnboundID LDAPConnection class and performs the startTLS extended operation.
